entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 late this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7 with temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 7 with temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
